name: mindwireless
overview:
mindWireless provides wireless management services to the world’s largest companies.

With our Wireless Best Practice Lifecycle we integrate four critical services - enrollment/inventory , procurement, billing optimization and allocation and reporting. When combined with our dedicated wireless help desk, business intelligence via mW SMART and administrative support, clients achieve improvement in efficiency, savings and productivity of their corporate mobility and wireless telecom expense management program.

The result: Improved asset management: Learn how every device is used. Track, analyze and update your complete wireless telecom inventory so you will know when it is time to make changes that will affect the bottom line. Powerful analytics: Real-time, electronic management of the data means better cash management, higher accountability for telecom expenses and the power to identify trends.

Insightful reports: Dozens of standard and ad hoc reports, from the enterprise level to individual charges on a line, all the way down to call-level detail are designed to give complete and comprehensive analysis of the total cost of your wireless telecom services.

Easy portal access: Extreme drill-down on the Web-based dashboard interface for anywhere/anytime access to detailed cellular user data. Screen customizations allow you to see only what is important to you. Increased management visibility: More detailed user data to improve decision-making, planning, budgeting and cost reduction.
